trans-unit.source: Sets the identity of the user for an ASP.NET application when forms authentication is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 啟用表單驗證時，請設定 ASP.NET 應用程式使用者的身分識別。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationModule sets the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to an <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object that represents the user identity for the current request when the authentication <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: FormsAuthenticationModule 設定目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件，代表目前的使用者身份識別要求時驗證<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A>設<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>中[驗證項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2)應用程式的組態檔元素。</xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationSection.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The FormsAuthenticationModule exposes an <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event that enables you to provide a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: FormsAuthenticationModule 所公開的<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件，可讓您提供的自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal><xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>物件</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal></xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate> event is accessed by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>事件透過指定名為的副程式**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Authenticate>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In IIS 7.0, using the <xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule> with the FormsAuthenticationModule is not supported.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 中使用的 IIS 7.0、<xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>不支援 with FormsAuthenticationModule。</xref:System.Web.Security.WindowsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: For more information about compatibility issues in Integrated modes, see [Moving an ASP.NET Application from IIS 6.0 to IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關整合式模式的相容性問題的詳細資訊，請參閱[從 IIS 6.0 的 ASP.NET 應用程式移轉至 IIS 7.0](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會呼叫這個建構函式來建立執行個體的<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>類別。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: After calling the constructor, it calls the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A> method to initialize the new <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> object.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫之後建構函式，它會呼叫<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>方法來初始化新<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>物件。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule.Init%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the application authenticates the current request.
trans-unit.target: 發生於應用程式會驗證目前的要求。

trans-unit.source: The Authenticate event is raised during the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> event.
trans-unit.target: 期間會引發驗證事件<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the Authenticate event of the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理的驗證事件的<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>類別藉由指定名為的副程式**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs><xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> to a custom <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs><xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性提供給**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>給自訂<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>物件。</xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A></xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A> property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定的值<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>屬性期間**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件、 表單驗證票證之 cookie 或 URL 中所提供的識別使用。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationEventArgs.User%2A>

trans-unit.source: The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication mode is set to <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode> in the [authentication Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2) element of the application's configuration file and the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is an active HTTP module for the application.
trans-unit.target: **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**驗證模式設定為時，才會引發事件<xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>中[驗證項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/27bc0ba9-f23a-45f3-ae42-dbe7916e3ee2)應用程式的組態檔元素和<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>是應用程式使用中的 HTTP 模組。</xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthenticationMode>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources, other than memory, used by the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的記憶體之外的所有資源釋都出<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref href="System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be called from application code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不是從應用程式程式碼呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The Init method ensures that the <xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule> is included in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> events.
trans-unit.target: Init 方法可確保<xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>隨附於處理<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest>和<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest>事件。</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.EndRequest> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest> </xref:System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref>執行個體。
